paper_abstract: This paper is devoted to find the form of the solutions of the following rational difference equations: x(n+1) = x(n)x(n-4)/x(n-3)(+/- 1 +/- x(n)x(n-4)), n = 0,1, ..., where the initial conditions are arbitrary real numbers. Also, we study the behavior of the solutions.
paper_title: The Dynamics and the Solutions of some Rational Difference Equations
